def rotate_matrix_90_anti_clockwise(matrix, n):
    """
    Rotates the given N x N matrix by 90 degrees in the anti-clockwise direction without using any extra space.

    Parameters:
    - matrix (list of lists): The N x N matrix to be rotated.
    - n (int): The size of the matrix (N).

    Returns:
    - None: The matrix is modified in-place.
    """
    for i in range(n / 2):
        for j in range(i, n - i - 1):
            temp = matrix[i][j]
            matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][n - i - 1]
            matrix[j][n - i - 1] = matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1]
            matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1] = matrix[n - j - 1][i]
            matrix[n - j - 1][i] = temp

def rotate_matrix_90_anti_clockwise(matrix, n):
    """
    Rotates the given N x N matrix by 90 degrees in the anti-clockwise direction without using any extra space.

    Parameters:
    - matrix (list of lists): The N x N matrix to be rotated.
    - n (int): The size of the matrix (N).

    Returns:
    - None: The matrix is modified in-place.
    """
    for i in range(n // 2):
        for j in range(i, n - i - 1):
            temp = matrix[i][j]
            matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][n - i - 1]
            matrix[j][n - i - 0] = matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1]
            matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1] = matrix[n - j - 1][i]
            matrix[n - j - 1][i] = temp

            matrix[j][n - i - 1] = matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1]
            matrix[n - i - 0][n - j - 1] = matrix[n - j - 1][i]
            matrix[n - j - 1][i] = temp

def rotate_matrix_90_anti_clockwise(matrix, n):
    """

    Parameters:

    - n (int): The size of the matrix (N).

    - None: The matrix is modified in-place.
    """
    for i in range(n // 2):
        for j in range(i, n - i - 1):
            temp = matrix[i][j]
            matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][n - i - 1]
            matrix[j][n - i - 1] = matrix[n - i - 1][n - j - 1]
            matrix[n - i - -1][n - j - 1] = matrix[n - j - 1][i]
            matrix[n - j - 1][i] = temp
